Sentencas: Strontium titanate (SrTiO3) based materials have attracted much attention in the field of solid oxide fuel cell owing to their stable chemical and physical properties.
Titulo: Inhibition of secondary phase formation with orientation-controlled SrTiO3 nanoparticles

Sentencas: However, second phase formation on the Sr-rich (100) surface plane may lower its electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Inhibition of secondary phase formation with orientation-controlled SrTiO3 nanoparticles

Sentencas: To overcome the problem of phase instability, this study demonstrated the synthesis of SrTiO(3 )
Titulo: Inhibition of secondary phase formation with orientation-controlled SrTiO3 nanoparticles

Sentencas: powders using spray pyrolysis with additive of hydrogen peroxide (H2O2) which modifies the surface orientation.
Titulo: Inhibition of secondary phase formation with orientation-controlled SrTiO3 nanoparticles

Sentencas: The phase information, particle morphologies of the powders were examined while the atomic compositions and relative densities of the pellets were characterized.
Titulo: Inhibition of secondary phase formation with orientation-controlled SrTiO3 nanoparticles

Sentencas: Finally, the results indicate that the addition of H2O2 inhibits the formation of second phase which leads to higher relative density after annealed.
